this minimal interference that I am achieving might actually be doing more harm. 8/
that in fact it is rabbit, and not the now absent rats, that the stoats etc are eating because - and I'm coming to the actual point - 7/
In the farmland, the stoats can be well fed on their own fresh rabbit. They don't need mine. So: I catch some rats. And I worry, & hope 6/
The cats are there. Nor has one of the stoat traps ever picked up a stoat - baited with fresh rabbit mince, on their sighted trails. 5/
a live cat trap, to use as required - fruitlessly, but I try. Never (baited and rebaited, sometimes for weeks) with tuna, has it lured a cat
there are no possums (because the council baits in the reserve); there are rats. I have a network of traps: some stoat, some rat, and 3/
